text_run.content: Alert notifications in Zilliz Cloud keep you informed about events occurring within your clusters. By default, these notifications are sent to specified user email addresses. However, you can also set up custom notification channels using webhooks for more integrated, event-driven notifications. This guide will walk you through the process of configuring alert notification channels.
To manage notification channels, make sure you are an
Currently, Zilliz Cloud offers four main types of notification channels:
: Receive notifications at specified email addresses.
: Integrate with a PagerDuty service using an integration key.
: Integrate with a Slack app using a webhook URL.
: Integrate with custom services or applications using a valid webhook URL.
You can access the management page of notification channels in the
dialog box in the Zilliz Cloud console.
